title: Burma, Berlin and Belsen
description: The Allied advance through Germany recaptures Berlin, but uncovers the atrocities of the Holocaust, as war in the Far East rages on. With Jonathan Dimbleby.
itunes:subtitle: The Allied advance through Germany recaptures Berlin.
itunes:summary: The Allied advance through Germany recaptures Berlin, but uncovers the atrocities of the Holocaust, as war in the Far East rages on. With Jonathan Dimbleby.
itunes:author: BBC World Service
